text:
Karl does a good job of explaining things along with the remediation: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/azure-stack/starting-vms-may-fail-after-installation-of-10-2023-cu-when/m-p/3956844
 It does seem that the fix for the Windows RCT performance issue has caused a compatibility problem with previous .RCT files if they exist. Philip Elder MCTS Senior Technical Architect Microsoft High Availability MVP
 E-mail:  Phone: +1 (780) 458-2028 Web: www.mpecsinc.com
 Blog: blog.mpecsinc.com
 Twitter: Twitter.com/MPECSInc
 Skype: MPECSInc. Please note: Although we may sometimes respond to email, text and phone calls instantly at all hours of the day, our regular business hours are 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Monday thru Friday. %40MPECSInc.Ca
